I was doing something like this:

I forgot to include the package in a Java source file, so I added at the top a
package declaration.
Then I performed a quick fix to move the compilation unit.
The quick fix worked ok, but I got the exception, and the corresponding editor
was closed.
*** Bug 103456 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
